name: F.U.D
description:
Wow this vending machine is super broken, it's giving out food for free!

Quickly input your selections to grab as many free snacks as you can!

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Change selection

Up Arrow - Make selection on menu

Because of the physics based nature of the game, there are a few bugs to do with the food not making it to the bottom of the machine even when selected correctly. Don't worry, if you hear the good beep you got the point!

Credits:

Bad Beep Sound: https://freesound.org/people/RICHERlandTV/sounds/216090/
